line_1: Which Learning near her little dome did stowe;
line_2: Tho' now so wide its waving branches flow;

line_1: Which Learning near her little dome did stowe;
line_2: And work the simple vassals mickle woe;

line_1: Which Learning near her little dome did stowe;
line_2: But their limbs shudder'd, and their pulse beat low;

line_1: A Work to wonder at — perhaps a STOW.
line_2: Nature shall join you; Time shall make it grow
